title: #86: The Keepers Revisited
description:
The RCP Team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) arc across Episode 4 of The Keepers which includes the revelation that almost 100 girls came forward and alleged abuse.

Our experts discuss the District Attorney Sharon May and the explanation of her decision not to prosecute and the police officer, aka "Deep Throat", who claims that he saw the evidence at the cemetery and interviewed the victims yet wished to remain anonymous.


#HerNameWasCathy

#HernameWasJoyce

#HerNameISJean

#HerNameISTeresa
